hymn.title: Fight, saints, for Jesus our Lord

layout.singingstanza: Fight, saints, for Je -- sus our Lord! Take in His life, stand in one ac -- cord! Nev -- er fear God's en -- e -- my; Tread on his head tri -- um -- phant -- ly! Pray that the dai -- ly church life be strong, That all the saints in spir -- it press on, Fight -- ing as the one new man, Ful -- fill -- ing our Lord's great plan! (Glo -- ry! Hal -- le -- lu -- jah!) Fight, saints, for Je -- sus our Lord! Take in His life, stand in one ac -- cord! Nev -- er fear God's en -- e -- my; Tread on his head tri -- um -- phant -- ly! Pray that the dai -- ly church life be strong, That all the saints in spir -- it press on, Fight -- ing as the one new man, Ful -- fill -- ing our Lord's great plan!

hymn.copyright: Michael J. Shea, 1908 (Also: Edwin H. Morris & Co., div of MPL Communications, Inc.)

lyrics.stanza: Fight, saints, for Jesus our Lord! Take in His life, stand in one accord! Never fear God's enemy; Tread on his head triumphantly! Pray that the daily church life be strong, That all the saints in spirit press on, Fighting as the one new man, Fulfilling our Lord's great plan! (Glory! Hallelujah!)
